info.title: Continuous Performance Management
info.description: SuccessFactors Continuous Performance Management (CPM) provides a platform to better track and manage your performance efforts, showing activities toward goals, their achievements, and your ongoing 1:1 conversations. CPM also provides the ability for users to give, request, and receive continuous feedback from others throughout the organization. Use these API to support activities and achievements and to support third-party integrations and building extensions.

externalDocs.description: Information about the Continuous Performance Management REST API is available on help.sap.com.

x-sap-shortText: APIs for SAP SuccessFactors Continuous Performance Management

get.description: Query all activity status for activities. The default behavior doesn’t include deleted status. Deleted status is only included when selected.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Default value is false. When set to true, the query response includes those with deleted status.

message.example: You do not have permission to access this feature. Please contact your HR administrator for help.

example.message: You do not have permission to access this feature. Please contact your HR administrator for help.
Internal error

details.message: There is a problem with the activity status. Please try again.

get.summary: Get a single Activity Status by the Activity Status record identifier
get.description: Query a single activity status by its Activity Status record identifier

parameters.name: statusRecordId
parameters.description: Activity Status record identifier for the activity

message.example: You do not have permission to access this feature. Please contact your HR administrator for help.

example.message: You do not have permission to access this feature. Please contact your HR administrator for help.
Please select a valid status identifier and try again.
Internal error

details.message: There is a problem with the activity status. Please try again.

delete.summary: Delete an Activity Update by its identifier
delete.description: Delete an update to an activity by its Activity Update record identifier

parameters.name: activityUpdateRecordId
parameters.description: Activity Update record identifier

example.message: Please select an activity which is part of the meeting and try again.
You don't have permission to delete an activity update.
Please select a valid activity update identifier and try again.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error in deleting your activity update. Please try again.

patch.summary: Edit an Activity Update by its identifier
patch.description: Make changes to an activity update by its identifier

parameters.name: activityUpdateRecordId
parameters.description: Activity Update record identifier

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: JSON Merge Patch/ RFC7386

details.message: You must enter a comment before you update the activity.

example.message: You do not have permission to edit an activity update for an activity.
Please select a valid activity update identifier and try again.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error in saving your activity update. Please try again.

get.summary: Get updates for activities by the Activity record identifier
get.description: Query all updates for an activity by its activity record identifier

parameters.name: activityRecordId
parameters.description: Activity record identifier

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of ActivityUpdate records chunk size returned with the default value as 10

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of ActivityUpdate records skipped. If value is 0, results start with the first record.

example.message: You do not have permission to access this user's data.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error accessing your activity updates. Please try again.

post.description: Create an activity update from the activity record identifier

parameters.name: activityRecordId
parameters.description: Activity record identifier

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: JSON as MIME type

example.message: Payload can't be empty and must contain only one activity element.
You do not have permission to create an activity
Internal error

details.message: There was an error in saving your activity update. Please try again.

post.description: Create an Activity resource with multiple scenarios, including create an Activity that is linked to a Performance Goal or a Development Goal or create an Achievement from an Activity

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication of signed on user

details.message: Please provide an Activity Name to save your activity.

example.message: You do not have permission to create an activity.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error in saving your activity. Please try again.

get.description: The read operation gets the list of Activities for a specific target user

parameters.name: subjectUserAssignmentUuid
parameters.description: Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) assigned to target user

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of Activity records chunk size returned with the default value as 200

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of Activity records skipped. If value is 0, results start with the first record.

example.message: You do not have permission to view Activities.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error accessing your activity. Please try again.

patch.description: Update an activity by adding (or removing) Performance Goals or Development Goals. Other scenarios supported are the unmarking the Achievement flag for an activity and changing the values of Activity properties, for example Name and Status.

parameters.name: activityRecordId
parameters.description: Activity record identifier

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: JSON Merge Patch RFC 7386

example.message: You do not have permission to edit an activity.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error when updating your activity. Please try again.

get.description: Query a single activity record identifier

parameters.name: activityRecordId
parameters.description: Activity record identifier

example.message: You do not have permission to view Activities.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error accessing your activity. Please try again.

delete.summary: Delete an Activity by its identifier
delete.description: Delete an activity by its activity record identifier

parameters.description: Activity record identifier

example.message: You do not have permission to delete an activity.

get.description: The read operation gets the list of Achievements for a specific target user

parameters.name: targetUserAssignmentUuid
parameters.description: Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) assigned to target user

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of Achievement records chunk size returned with the default value as 200

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of Achievement records skipped. If value is 0, results start with the first record.

example.message: You do not have permission to view these Achievements.
Internal error

details.message: There was an error while accessing your achievements. Please try again.

get.summary: Get entities of Continuous Performance Management permissions
get.description: Fetch Continuous Performance Management permissions for current or target user

parameters.name: targetUserAssignmentUuid
parameters.description: Check permissions for the target user by their Universal Unique Identifier (UUID)

example.message: Internal error

details.message: There was an error in getting user permissions. Please try again.

createAchievement.description: Can an achievement be created when the Activity is updated with this status?

createdBy.description: Created User UUID of the status

statusRecordId.description: Record ID of Activity Status entity

subjectUserAssignmentUuid.description: Assignment UUID of Activity subject user

createdDate.description: Offset date time of Activity creation

lastModifiedDate.description: Offset date time of last Activity modification

isAchievement.description: Flag to indicate whether current Activity is an Achievement

achievementDate.description: Date when Activity is marked as Achievement

createdBy.description: Created User UUID of the activity

createdDate.description: This denotes when the activityUpdates got created

lastModifiedDate.description: This denotes the lastModified dateTime of the updates

createdBy.description: Created User UUID of the activity update

createdDate.description: Offset date time of Achievement creation

createdBy.description: Created User UUID of the achievement

activityRecordId.description: Record ID of linked Activity entity

subjectUserAssignmentUuid.description: Assignment UUID of Achievement subject user

achievementDate.description: Date when Activity is marked as Achievement

hasPermission.description: Whether the target user has permission

permissionType.description: Type of the entity for which the permission is granted

permisssionValue.description: Whether the permission is view or edit
